data.name: Unicorn Dungeon Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is the tutorial for Unicorn Dungeon!

Unicorn Dungeon is an absurdist comedy point & click adventure game set in the strange (and often silly) magical land of Artovya, but actually just in a dungeon.

Grab this demo/tutorial and give it a try for free.

data.short_description: This is the tutorial for Unicorn Dungeon! Unicorn Dungeon is an absurdist comedy point & click adventure game set in the strange (and often silly) magical land of Artovya, but actually just in a dungeon. Grab this demo/tutorial and give it a try for free.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 450+ with 1024MB+ VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 11 sound device

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTS 450+ with 1024MB+ VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 11 sound device
